content: Isabelle. We should be friends. Let’s embark on a fabulous journey of helping people to just be. I also agree that balance is this made up measurement and we’ll never actually get there because then life will be boring and movies will never have another bad guy. I mean soap operas have been resurrecting killed off villains for decades and every single time — they come back. And the storyline continues. So maybe we just learn to have more fun BEING? Knowing the off kilter makes us go on another new adventure?
